message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity to acquire an item that holds significant value to me and is estimated to be worth $10000 to you. I understand the importance of making a fair deal, so I'm offering it to you at a special price of $9500. This is a great chance to secure a valuable asset at a discount. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction. Looking forward to your response!
